DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate efficacy , safety pharmacokinetics ASP1941 male female patient type 2 diabetes mellitus
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study ASP1941 Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Established diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus Fasting serum Cpeptide level > 0.6 ng/mL HbA1c 7.0 10.0 % Body Mass Index 20 45 kg/m2 Serum creatinine > upper limit normal Proteinuria ( albumin/creatinine ratio > 300 mg/g ) Dysuria and/or urinary tract infection Significant renal , hepatic cardiovascular disease Ketosis Hypertension Severe gastrointestinal disease
